title: Hook up Geo3DPoint query factory methods in TestGeo3DPoint
description: Tests of the Geo3DPoint query factory API methods are needed, and probably the best way is to hook these up in the TestGeo3DPoint random stress test.

comments.author: Karl Wright
comments.content: Michael McCandless: Any objection if I commit this?  Or would you want to beast it a while first?
